Take a cue from http://groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/865 
I wrote (well, modified the URIRegexpfilter) a filter that can be used
to filter content types by regular expression. You can download the source
from

http://www.dreamersrealm.net/tree/source/ContentTypeRegExpFilter.java

To use it drop into /src/java/org/archive/crawler/filter, rebuild the
heritrix jar, and add org.archive.crawler.filter.ContentTypeRegExpFilter to
the end of src/conf/modules/filters.options.

Install the new jar and filters.options, restart Heritrix, and you can
now add the filter to the Writer.

    -tree
